Class Animal

  • java.lang.Object
    • Animal
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Actor
    public abstract class Animal
extends java.lang.Object
implements Actor
    An abstarct class representing shared characteristics of animals.
    Version:
    2016.02.29 (2)
    Author:
    Benedict Morley and Laurence Andrews

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      Animal​(boolean randomAge, Field field, Location location)
      Create a new animal with a random age at location in field as well as giving it a gender and a chance to be diseased.
